ygData.subject: Re: 4 Life...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hackers aren t invading, a bunch of suburban children with afr too much time on their hands and virtually no working knowledge of what they are doing are

    Hackers aren't invading, a bunch of suburban children with afr 
too much time on their hands and virtually no working knowledge of 
what they are doing are invading the NBWRPG. Simply put, you are 
being bombarded with the leftover crap seen in these annoying 
wannabes' daily lives. Bleh.
    At any rate, if they were intelligent, they'd have realized their 
mistakes before they even attempted to do what they are. They would 
have certainly done their homework, if they were actual hackers. But, 
like I said, they aren't intelligent or hackers.
    I mean, come on, my name is Daniel, not Dave. I would _never_ 
name my characters so simply; it's just not my style. And, perhaps 
most obvious, the last posts seen from me were several paragraphs 
long and at least moderately descriptive. The childish things these 
morons are up to involves posts that aren't running more than ten 
sentences, and never once have they followed any sort of sentence 
structure known to the person they are imitating.
    Yes, I'm sure you can tell I am rather angry about this, but only 
because the idiots couldn't do a decent job of being stupid. If they 
want to be hackers, they should first find out the difference between 
hacking and "|34|>455 1337 |-|4xx0|2i|\|6". Geez, what do they teach 
these children nowadays? They need role models. Go read up on Cap'n 
Crunch, Matt Mingo, and a few others. We _reallY- have to start a 
Script Kiddies Anonymous. And even then, these fools aren't even good 
enough to be script kiddies!

     Daniel (NOT DAVE) Finnamore
